description:
The quest to recover lost memories draws Hakufu and friends into an ambush at an abandoned school. Amidst a flurry of flying fists, the past is revisited.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jouchi o Motte Kanja to Nasu
Nutze deine weisesten Leute für die Spionage
Recruter ses espions chez des hommes à l`intelligence supérieur
上智を以て間者と為す
